snippet: Alex Chiasson broke a third-period tie with his first goal in 13 games, and Lindy Ruff earned his 600th NHL coaching victory with a 3-2 win over his former team, the Buffalo Sabres, on Monday night....

headline.print_headline: Stars Coach Ruff Earns 600th NHL Win Over Sabres
headline.main: Stars Coach Ruff Earns 600th NHL Win Over Sabres

lead_paragraph: Alex Chiasson broke a third-period tie with his first goal in 13 games, and Lindy Ruff earned his 600th NHL coaching victory with a 3-2 win over his former team, the Buffalo Sabres, on Monday night.
